UserProfile.title: User Profile
UserProfile.description: Represents a user's public profile information.

avatarUrl.description: URL of the user's profile picture.

points.description: The user's total accumulated intel points.

CricketerProfile.title: Cricketer Profile
CricketerProfile.description: Stores the static profile data for a cricketer.

TeamProfile.title: Team Profile
TeamProfile.description: Stores the static profile data for a cricket team (both IP and National).

FanRating.title: Fan Rating
FanRating.description: Represents a single rating submitted by a fan for a player or team.

userId.description: The UID of the user who submitted the rating.

entityId.description: The ID of the cricketer or team being rated.

ratings.description: A map of attribute names to scores (e.g., {'Batting': 8.5}).

/cricketers/{cricketerId}.description: Stores base profile information for individual cricketers.

/teams/{teamId}.description: Stores base profile information for teams (IP and National).

/ratings/{ratingId}.description: Collection of all individual fan ratings for players and teams.
